spells.name: Bane
spells.description: Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and saves vs. fear.

spells.name: Cause Fear
spells.description: A creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Command
spells.description: One subject obeys a command for 1 round.

spells.name: Death Knell
spells.description: Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.

spells.name: Detect Poison
spells.description: Detects poison in a creature or object.

spells.name: Doom
spells.description: One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

spells.name: Protection from Good/Law
spells.description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignments.

spells.name: Summon Monster I
spells.description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.
